text: (ai rasool) kah do ki jo shakhs gumaraahee mein pada hai to khuda usako dheel hee deta chala jaata hai yahaan tak ki us cheez ko (apanee onkhon se) dekh lenge jinaka unase vaayada kiya gaya hai ya azaab ya qayaamat to us vakt unhen maaloom ho jaega ki maratabe mein kaun badatar hai aur lashkar (jatthe) mein kaun kamazor hai (bekas) hai
